content:
You can sign up for the "Stress Less, Breathe More" workshop on March 21 online or by contacting the studio directly.

**Online Registration:**

1. Visit Pilgrimage Yoga's website at [www.pilgrimageyoga.com](http://www.pilgrimageyoga.com).
2. Click on the "Workshops and Events" tab at the top of the page.
3. Scroll down to the "Stress Less, Breathe More" workshop on March 21 and click on the "Sign Up" button.
4. Fill out the online registration form with your name, email, and phone number.
5. Choose your payment option: you can pay online with a credit card or pay at the studio on the day of the workshop.
6. Review and agree to the terms and conditions, then submit your registration.

**Phone or In-Person Registration:**

If you prefer to register over the phone or in person, you can:

1. Call Pilgrimage Yoga at (619) 294-9642 during business hours.
2. Speak with a studio staff member to register for the workshop and provide your payment information.
3. Alternatively, you can visit the studio in person during business hours to register and pay for the workshop.

**Important:**

* Registration is limited to 20 students, so be sure to sign up early to secure your spot.
* A $10 deposit is required to secure your spot, which will be applied to the full workshop price of $40.
* If you need to cancel, please notify the studio at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund.

Once you've registered, you'll receive a confirmation email with details about the workshop, including what to bring, what to expect, and any other important information.

I hope this helps! If you have any further questions, feel free to ask.
